channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Phone snatching network behind one in four thefts in London targeted in police crackdown
Board asks 3 Durham schools to 'pause' prom cancellation after student protest

I paid $560 for a 7-day Eurail pass to country hop by train across Europe. It was so much better than flying.

item.title: Ex-NFL quarterback Mark Sanchez charged with felony over violent altercation
item.description: Mark Sanchez was hospitalized with multiple stab wounds following a violent altercation over the weekend.

item.title: WATCH: Hundreds of hikers trapped by blizzard on Mount Everest
item.description: An effort is underway to rescue hundreds of hikers who became trapped on Mount Everest due to an unexpected blizzard.

item.title: Mark Sanchez charged with felony due to victim's 'incredibly significant injuries'
item.description: Former NFL quarterback and current Fox Sports commentator Mark Sanchez has now been charged with a felony.

item.title: Air traffic controllers told to keep working during government shutdown
item.description: National Air Traffic Controllers Association tells its members that failing to report to work could cost them their job.

item.title: Government shutdown halts data, stokes risk as economy wobbles, experts say
item.description: Federal agencies said they would not release some key data during the shutdown.
